ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] emergency: please read regarding new bard songs
ygData.msgSnippet: Heh, I have no trouble believing that GZ told him this.  The same GZ that told us xyz was not broken and then later changed his tune when it was demonstrated
ygData.messageBody:
Heh,

I have no trouble believing that GZ told him this. The same GZ that told us
"xyz" was not broken and then later changed his tune when it was
demonstrated to him. So, yes, GZ probably did tell him that and yes the
song makes you "invis" to undead in some places. You are in their world
now. Things can be two different ways at the same time.

Sylly

> From: "Firehawk" <firehawk@...>
>
> Regarding invis to undead.
>
> I seriously doubt GM's or Verant staff told you that clouding does not
> effect undead. We on this list have battled over it for a long time but
the
> facts support that clouding is a level based song in regards to the
undead.
